ygData.subject: Re: I hate to be a downer... but..
ygData.msgSnippet: I disagree with your comments.  Verant is trying desperately to take money out of the system.  Almost all of the new quests involve a method of depleting your
ygData.messageBody:
I disagree with your comments. Verant is trying desperately to take money out
of the system. Almost all of the new quests involve a method of depleting your
bank account. Trade skills have always been a money pit. Decreasing the
charges from 50 to 1 upon trade would accomplish nothing but making the item
unsellable, and causing distrust between the players who are driving the
"player driven economy", this fact alone seems to be in direct conflict with
Verant's vision. Its a bug. I suggest we all /bug it, and if you can
fabricate an aqua lung, I suggest you do so and /petition a GM so he can see
first hand.

Cheers
Malkin Fennin Ro
